ViewObject.Name: LovMonthVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT 1 AS MON_ID, 'JANUARY' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2 AS MON_ID, 'FEBRUARY' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3 AS MON_ID, 'MARCH' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4 AS MON_ID, 'APRIL' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5 AS MON_ID, 'MAY' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6 AS MON_ID, 'JUNE' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7 AS MON_ID, 'JULY' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8 AS MON_ID, 'AUGUST' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9 AS MON_ID, 'SEPTEMBER' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10 AS MON_ID, 'OCTOBER' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 11 AS MON_ID, 'NOVEMBER' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 12 AS MON_ID, 'DECEMBER' AS MON_NM FROM DUAL
